resources.string: It is not over yet! Press learn more button to see your next steps. Remember to never give up and we hope you get better soon!
Congratulations on your results. To keep it that way press the learn more button and learn how to stay healthy!
There has been an issue with opening your web browser

string-array.name: intro_fun_facts
string-array.item: Lung cancer strikes both men and women and people of all ages. Lung cancer affects both men and women with the average age being 70 years. Younger adults can still develop the disease with approximately 7% of lung cancer cases occurring in people under the age of 55.
Drinking water containing arsenic INCREASES the risk of lung chance
Current and former smokers, who are taking high-dose beta-carotene supplements are increasing the risk of lung cancer
Lung cancer accounts for 12% of all new cancer diagnoses but 21% of all cancer deaths
More lives are lost to lung cancer than to colorectal and pancreatic cancers combined

string-array.name: input_details_questions
string-array.item: Do you suffer from any chronic disease?
Do you feel shortness of breath?
